statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -14 \\ -18 \\ 18 \\ 20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 6 \\ 12 \\ -9 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
